about.title: درباره
about.heading: درباره
about.support: شما می‌توانید با کمک مالی یا حمایت مالی از طریق پلتفرم‌های زیر از پروژه tldw Browser_Assistant حمایت کنید:

healthPage.title: Health Status

connection.failed: Connection failed. Please check your settings.
connection.failedDetailed: Connection failed. Please check your server URL and API key.

hints.streamingIdle: Abort streaming if no updates received within this time. Default: {{seconds}}s.

tldw.loadError: Unable to load tldw server settings. Check your connection and try again.

apiKey.label: API Key

about.title: About tldw_server Integration
